item.title: Creating a website with Hugo - part 2
item.author: Author
item.description: In the first part we saw how to set up HUGO (with Docker), how to create a site and set the theme. As last step, we added a content page using hugo new posts/my_first_post.md. Let’s move on and add content to the page.

item.title: Creating a website with Hugo - part 1
item.author: Author
item.description: In this series, I want to describe how I created and manage this web site.

item.title: My First Post
item.author: Author
item.description: Let’s start! This is my first post on my personal website. ðŸ˜Ž I finally decided to make it, my own personal site. This site is intended mainly to note down technical solutions regarding my DevOps activities. Maybe I’ll also write something about my life, sports, we’ll see… ðŸ˜›
